channel.title: MythScape
channel.description:
I am using MythScape which is a starter source but i have Two Glitches
1) The Stats are 1/99 how do i change it to say 99/99 and to +1 everytime i level up eg: when i level up from level 1 it says 1/2 2) The Equipment Bonus is always 120, how do i make it so that its proper bonue

MythScape is a basic source… Which means it hasn’t been edited yet, i want to make my own server
